description:
This Excel 2013 course is designed for the absolute beginner, if you have heard of excel or seen it and wondered what you can do with it then this course is for you. If you have some knowledge but want to improve upon your skills this course is also for you.

If spreadsheet programs over whelms you, rest assured this course we will break down this popular spreadsheet program bit by bit, you will learn everything from entering data into cells to visually analyzing your excel tables using clustered column charts.

Learning My Microsoft Excel 2013 can help you in getting a new job or a promotion in your current position. At the end of this course you will also receive a certificate of completion and have such a thorough knowledge of the program that you will be able to place it on your resume as a skill.

Here are some of the topics we will go over in this course.

  • Create a new workbook
  • Enter data into cells
  • Select cell ranges
  • Copy and paste data
  • Create new sheets
  • Delete sheets
  • Protect sheets
  • Save excel files in PDF
  • Email excel files from excel
  • Analyze your data using Charts
  • Use basic to advance Formulas
title: Microsoft Excel 2013 for the absolute beginner
